definition: excessive or irrational devotion to some activity
details:
noun
- excessive or irrational devotion to some activity
= example: excessive or irrational devotion to some activity
= synonyms: fetich
- a charm superstitiously believed to embody magical powers
= synonyms: fetich, hoodoo, juju, voodoo, vodoun
- a form of sexual desire in which gratification depends to an abnormal degree on some object or item of clothing or part of the body
= example: a form of sexual desire in which gratification depends to an abnormal degree on some object or item of clothing or part of the body
